summary: Relating to transportation improvements; authorizing and providing for the issuance of unlimited tax general obligation bonds in one or more series, if and as authorized by the qualified voters of the City at an election therein on November 4, 1997, pursuant to Ordinance 118641, to provide the funds to pay all or a part of the cost of transportation improvements and the costs of issuance and sale of the bonds and for other City purposes; providing for certain terms and covenants of the bonds; providing for the sale of the bonds; providing for agreements and activities in connection with proceeds of the bonds; and authorizing the creation of one or more subfunds in the Transportation Bond Fund.
